name: HackEPS2017
description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English

name: Charla DialogFlow
description: Nuestro compañero Guiller Orellana Trullos realizó un taller para los chicos y chicas de ESO y Bachillerato del instituto Samuel Gili y Gaya de Lleida sobre Chatbots, los alumnos y alumnas pudieron llevar la teoria que Guillem explicó a la práctica mediante la herramienta de Google DialogFlow!
